vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Amor(?), first mentioned at Gen.10.16; descended from Canaan (H3667); along with Sidon (H6721), Heth (H2845), Jebusite (H2983), Girgashite (H1622), Hivite (H2340), Arkite (H6208), Sinite (H5513), Arvadite (H0721), Zemarite (H6786) and Hamathite (H2577)
§ Amorite = "a sayer"
one of the peoples of east Canaan and beyond the Jordan, dispossessed by the Israelite incursion from Egypt
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞摩利 这个陽性名詞 集合名詞在原文的意思是 可能是"山居者"之意
約旦河西迦南東方的一族, 被出埃及進迦南的以色列人所驅逐
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚摩利 这个阳性名词 集合名词在原文的意思是 可能是"山居者"之意
约旦河西迦南东方的一族, 被出埃及进迦南的以色列人所驱逐
